meanings.definition: Resembling pus in appearance or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The infected wound had a pusslike discharge.
meanings.sent2: The yellow, thick liquid looked pusslike.
meanings.sent3: The spilled custard on the floor appeared pusslike.
meanings.sent4: The polluted river was a pusslike stream of filth.
meanings.sent5: The moldy cheese had a pusslike texture.

meanings.sent1: The foul smell was pusslike and unpleasant.
meanings.sent2: The rotten fruit emitted a pusslike odor.
meanings.sent3: The spoiled milk had a pusslike taste.
meanings.sent4: The decaying garbage had a pusslike stench.
meanings.sent5: The murky pond water was pusslike in color.
